Class Box

  • java.lang.Object
    • Box

  • public class Box
extends java.lang.Object
    A shape of a rectangle that can be drawn in its Screen2D parent. Note the new shiftCorners method.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Box(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2, char a)
      Create a rectangle shape.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void draw()
      Draws the rectangle shape in the parent.
      void setParent(Screen2D screen)
      Set the parent to draw inside.
      void shiftCorners(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2)
      Translates (moves) the two corner points of this box.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Box

        public Box(int x1,
           int y1,
           int x2,
           int y2,
           char a)
        Create a rectangle shape.
        Parameters:
        x1 - Horizontal position of the top-left corner.
        y1 - Vertical position of the top-left corner.
        x2 - Horizontal position of the bottom-right corner.
        y2 - Vertical position of the bottom-right corner.
        a - The character used to draw the rectangle.

    • Method Detail

      • setParent

        public void setParent(Screen2D screen)
        Set the parent to draw inside.
        Parameters:
        screen - The Screen2D instance that this box will be drawn inside.

      • shiftCorners

        public void shiftCorners(int x1,
                         int y1,
                         int x2,
                         int y2)
        Translates (moves) the two corner points of this box.
        Parameters:
        x1 - The horizontal amount of translation to the top left corner.
        y1 - The vertical amount of translation to the top left corner.
        x2 - The horizontal amount of translation to the bottom right corner.
        y2 - The vertical amount of translation to the bottom right corner.

      • draw

        public void draw()
        Draws the rectangle shape in the parent.
